TestDescription.name: MediaWiki chunked uploads security issue
TestDescription.Description:
MediaWiki user Marco discovered that security checks for file uploads were not being run when the file was uploaded in chunks through the API. This option has been available to users who can upload files since MediaWiki 1.19. [break][break]
This issue was fixed in [dark][bold]MediaWiki v1.20.6[/dark][/bold] and [dark][bold]MediaWiki v1.19.7[/dark][/bold].
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can upload arbitrary files on the wiki.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of MediaWiki.
